block.p: Pairings of six beers with six cheeses, including Victory Storm King Imperial Stout with Colston Bassett Stilton, will be featured at a tasting on Jan. 21 from 4 to 6 p.m. at Chanterelle, 2 Harrison Street (Hudson Street). The cost is $55: (212) 966-6960.

All red wines by the bottle will be sold at a discount of 25 percent through March 11 at seven midtown restaurants: Sea Grill, Brasserie, Brasserie 8 1/2, Rock Center Café, Café Centro, Naples 45 and Nick & Stef's Steakhouse. Those ordering red wines will receive a copy of Wine Enthusiast magazine's ''Pocket Guide to Wine,'' and a three-month subscription to the magazine.

All red wines by the bottle will be sold at a discount of 25 percent through March 11 at seven midtown restaurants: Sea Grill, Brasserie, Brasserie 8 1/2, Rock Center Café, Café Centro, Naples 45 and Nick & Stef's Steakhouse. Those ordering red wines will receive a copy of Wine Enthusiast magazine's ''Pocket Guide to Wine,'' and a three-month subscription to the magazine.
